data.message:
Hello, @Facebook, a lot to say, many thoughts, few words, almost speechless,....first #Thanx for such #motivation & #moralizing & mobilizing us all to accomplish virtually what we may never b able to do in real....!! 
....Facebook a way to connect & circle the globe in 80 secs, .....2nd its the most #user friendly forum & platform to engage in different positive activities!! ;) <3 . 
..
Hence starting facebook  #era is gonna be remembered evn aftr million years! ;)

replies.message: Thank you so much for the kind words, Suleman. We're glad to hear that you're enjoying your Facebook experience! Thanks for being a part of the Facebook Community, and hope you're having a wonderful day! -Lauren
